 1 2 51 
 It launches NS Vegas integration sessions 
 each of them call integrand NC times. The NS/NC
 parameters are defined in in the first 2 items
 of this menu. The results of integration are 
 displayed on the screen and  stored in files. 
 If accuracy of integration is not sufficient
 the user launch 'Start integration' again to 
 continue Monte Carlo.
